definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
to face sth/to be confronted with
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view

sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 鎢鉻鈷合金6閥座面，使用壽命更長。

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技術面，短期及中期各項技術指標保持多頭強勢狀態。

sentences.english: Keyes, however, was on foot at the back of the parade.
sentences.chinese: 然而，凱斯走在遊行隊伍的最後面。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微觀面和宏觀面的重大調整仍在進行之中。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微觀面和宏觀面的重大調整仍在進行之中。

sentences.english: A new kind of modelling was proposed on aircraft wing structural analysis and optimization.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的飛機翼面結構分析和優化的建模技術。

sentences.english: Dual-space approach is for multi-target tracking.
sentences.chinese: 面目標跟蹤採用對偶空間轉換算法等方法。

sentences.english: The little girl stood in the very back of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 這個小女孩站在教室的最後面。

sentences.english: Add this to the cabbage, carrots and apples evenly.
sentences.chinese: 然後在這裏面加入等量的紫甘藍，胡蘿蔔和蘋果。

sentences.english: For the sphere, that unique geometry is the perfectly spherical sphere.
sentences.chinese: 對於球來說，這個唯一的幾何就是正圓球面。

sentences.english: The cuting-to-Vary direction radiation pattern illustrates tha…
sentences.chinese: 用多切割面輻射方向圖描述該天線的全向性。

sentences.english: Reliability issues aside, there’s a deeper principle at stake here.
sentences.chinese: 先不提可靠性的問題，這裏面有一個更深層的原則。

sentences.english: From the stereographic plots of the slip line directions measured around the specimen surface, the slip planes were determined.
sentences.chinese: 根據試樣表面滑移線的方向，在極圖上確定滑移面。

sentences.english: Mrs. Taylor and Mr. Zhou meet on the street.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒先生同周先生在街上見到面。

sentences.english: Minor Circle is the circle formed by the innermost surface of the spline.
sentences.chinese: 小圓是花鍵的最小齒形面的排斥圓。

sentences.english: A student in the back raised his hand.
sentences.chinese: 坐在教室最後面的一個學生舉起了手。

definition: abbr. of 麵包車的士|面包车的士[mian4 bao1 che1 di1 shi4]/minivan taxi
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
